articles.title: Landslide on Mars: European orbiter captures 5-km-long surface movement on Red Planet - India Today
articles.description: The Exo-Mars Orbiter hovering above the Red Planet has captured images of surface material movement on the Red Planet in great detail.

articles.title: Nigerian students amass degrees to stay in Europe - BBC News
articles.description: Modupe Osunkoya enrolled on her third post-graduate degree because she says there are no jobs at home.
articles.content:
By Nduka OrjinmoBBC News, Abuja
image sourceMODupe Osunkoya
After more than 200 unsuccessful job applications on LinkedIn alone, Nigerian student Modupe Osunkoya knew time was running out for her t… [+5423 chars]
